Reviews.Content: friend arrived hotel sunday august 1 2010 8am check 1200 tired flown staff friendly helpful tried asap 11am invited breakfast generous gesture package day research travel days mmm staff hotel reception delighted realize informed told bus bus station tram directions helpful info breakfast varied light delicious breakfast morning package deal enjoyed alot friends waiters helped friend turkish effort learn language plenty help helped trip waiters delighted hear friend speak language lessons morning comfortable spacious clean modern bathroom safety deposit box closet sliding door couldnt close time found space comfortable nice evenings sitting round table chatting checked spa pool didnt clean modern nice standards review hotel home istanbul comfortable facilities friendly staff decided trip istanbul book thank golden age 2
